summary: The api-go update workflow fails when commit messages contain backtick (`) characters, causing shell command parsing errors during the 'Prepare inputs' step.
userImpact: Developers cannot merge pull requests or commit to the repository if their commit messages contain backtick characters, blocking normal workflow operations.
rootCause: Backtick characters in commit messages are not properly escaped when passed to shell scripts, causing unintended command substitution interpretation.
